ConnectionPool.name: Sample Relational Connection
ConnectionPool.Description:
Connection pool for Sample relational db source. Instead of editing connectivity parameters in each connection pool, update the RPD and Session variables that hold that information (Manage > Variables)
You can also replace the "VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.DSN)" by the full string below : (DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=VALUEOF(DB_HOST))(PORT=VALUEOF(DB_PORT))))(CONNECT_DATA=(SID=VALUEOF(DB_SID))))
